references.paper_title: Invertible generative models for inverse problems: mitigating representation error and dataset bias
references.reason: This paper introduces invertible generative models for solving inverse problems, a core concept in the current work.
This paper introduces neural ordinary differential equations which is the foundation of the flow-based generative models used in the current work.
This paper introduces flow matching, a key technique used in the current work for generative modeling.
This paper introduces denoising diffusion probabilistic models which is related to flow-based models and is mentioned in the introduction of the current work.

references.paper_title: Diffusion posterior sampling for general noisy inverse problems
